Detailed Description

template<class tArg>
class XTalker< tArg >

M/M Listener and Talker model
See also:
XListener, XSignalStore tArg: value which will be derivered tArgWrapper: copied argument, will be released by GC someday

shared_ptr< XListener > XTalker< tArg >::connectShared (  const shared_ptr< tObj > &  obj,
void(tClass::*)(const tArg &)  func,
int  flags = 0

Associate XTalker to XListener Talker will call user member function of listener. This function can be called over once.

See also:
disconnect(), mask(), unmask() XListener holds shared_ptr() of the instance

template<class tArg>
void XTalker< tArg >::talk (  const tArg &  arg  ) 
 

Request a talk to connected listeners. If a listener is not mainthread model, the listener will be called later.

Parameters:
arg passing argument to all listeners If listener avoids duplication, lock won't be passed to listener.
